game.name: Jade's Journey
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Join Jade in her journey to master her powers and save her father! Jade is a regular girl living in a regular village until one day... it all changes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join Jade in her journey to master her powers and save her father! Jade is a regular girl living in a regular village until one day... it all changes.
